ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: Awww, the passing of another legacy!  All you bards take screen shots of yourselves surfing now while you can because one day it will be a fading memory of our
ygData.messageBody:
Awww, the passing of another legacy! All you bards take screen shots of
yourselves surfing now while you can because one day it will be a fading
memory of our one-time coolness.

I have an idea, lets twist selo's and aria and take a surf out over some
water and snap a few screenshots for posterity.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 2:03 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied
>
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> But I don't want to stop surfing, does anyone? I think that
> is one of our
> coolest animations that we surf across the ground as we blaze
> across Norrath
> in a cacophony of light bubbles. It will be a sad day indeed
> when even our
> appearance is nerfed. Heaven above forbid bards should look
> cooler at any
> time than someone else. That might be unbalancing. Never
> mind that we have
> a stick for a drum, and we strum it!
>
> Kitasi, tired of being nerfed on E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Eric Cathell [mailto:embroidery@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 12:56 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied
>
>
> From: "Eric Cathell" <embroidery@...>
>
> well as of next patch to the prod servers you prolly wont...
>
> Jalaric
> 14th bard
> Test Server
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 11:13 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied
>
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> I definitely still surf across the land when I play my drum
> at least as of
> last nite. I do remain sitting while playing now however.
>
> Kitasi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 5:06 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied
>
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> wait, i know when you sit while playing a lute now you no
> longer stand up.
> when you play selo's with a drum, you don't sail across the
> land when the
> song pulses anymore? you just run like normal? wow i had
> not noticed that,
> sheesh.
>
> Shada
>
> > fix our
> > graphics...hell they stopped us from surfing now when we
> play selo's(i
> > really liked that) so it must not be too hard to fix animations.
> >
> > Jalaric
> > Trickster Bard of the 14th song
>
